title: Landscape at Stanton Street
marks: Signature; Chop mark Signed in pencil: [de Kooning]
text: One of the most important figures of Abstract Expressionism, De Kooning made prints only sporadically during his career. His best prints, including this masterful lithograph of 1971, are dynamic variants of action painting on stone.
